section.title: Feedback
section.para: We value feedback on our software as well as our documentation. Please find ways to contact us in this section.

section.title: Reporting Bugs in Cyrus IMAP
section.para: Bug reports can be logged in our Bugzilla issue tracker. Please bear in mind registration is required.
When reporting a bug, please prepare to provide the following information;

listitem.para: Your platform, and if applicable, your distribution and the distribution version.
The exact version of Cyrus IMAP you are using.
If a packaged version is used, the source of the packaged version.
If a custom version is used, any options that may have specified during the build process.

section.para: provide some text on logging a new ticket in our bugzilla, information to provide, etc. Possibly mention the life cycle of a product version series.
